@mainpage
An interface to the phone application.

interface.name: com.lomiri.TelephonyServiceApprover
interface.dox:d: An interface to the phone approver application.

method.name: AcceptCall
method.dox:d: Accept any incoming call and launches the lomiri-telephony-service. If there is no incoming call, this method does nothing.

method.name: HangUpAndAcceptCall
method.dox:d: Hang up an existing call, accept any incoming call and launches the lomiri-telephony-service. If there is no incoming call, this method does nothing.

method.name: RejectCall
method.dox:d: Reject any incoming call. If there is no incoming call, this method has no effect.

method.name: HandleMediaKey
method.dox:d: Handle events generated by media key buttons usually present on headsets.
